snippet.title: Ratten Reich - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer and Road Map
snippet.description:
Get a peek at gameplay and some of the battlefields of Ratten Reich in this latest trailer for the upcoming RTS game. Ratten Reich will be available in Steam Early Access on August 9, 2024. You can wishlist it on Steam if you're interested: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1717250/Ratten_Reich/

Our game is made by a small indie collective of 5 people. We hope for your support and understanding thanks!

Ratten Reich focuses on realistic combat in a unique, steampunk/dieselpunk world ripped apart by an ongoing war between rats, mice, cockroaches, and lizards.
You can get better acquainted with the game and the roadmap in our Discord. https://discord.gg/rattenreich
